recommendations.title: Migrate RDS to PostgreSQL
recommendations.description: Use PostgreSQL, an open-source relational database management system, instead of AWS RDS.
steps: Assess the compatibility of PostgreSQL with your existing database schema.
Migrate your database to PostgreSQL.
Update any dependent applications to use PostgreSQL.

recommendations.title: Right-size EC2 instances
recommendations.description: Downsize your EC2 instances to smaller, more cost-effective sizes.
steps: Assess the current usage of your EC2 instances.
Downsize instances to smaller sizes based on usage patterns.
Monitor usage patterns and adjust sizes as needed.

recommendations.title: Use Azure Cosmos DB instead of AWS RDS
recommendations.description: Use Azure Cosmos DB, a globally distributed, multi-model database service, instead of AWS RDS.
steps: Assess the compatibility of Azure Cosmos DB with your existing database schema.
Migrate your database to Azure Cosmos DB.
Update any dependent applications to use Azure Cosmos DB.

recommendations.title: Use AWS S3 Infrequent Access (IA) instead of Standard Storage
recommendations.description: Use AWS S3 Infrequent Access (IA) for storage that is infrequently accessed.
steps: Assess the access patterns of your S3 buckets.
Move infrequently accessed data to S3 IA.
Monitor access patterns and adjust storage as needed.

recommendations.title: Use GCP Cloud Storage instead of AWS S3
recommendations.description: Use GCP Cloud Storage, a NoSQL, object storage service, instead of AWS S3.
steps: Assess the compatibility of GCP Cloud Storage with your existing application.
Migrate your data to GCP Cloud Storage.
Update any dependent applications to use GCP Cloud Storage.

recommendations.title: Use Apache Cassandra instead of AWS RDS
recommendations.description: Use Apache Cassandra, a free and open-source, distributed NoSQL database management system, instead of AWS RDS.
steps: Assess the compatibility of Apache Cassandra with your existing database schema.
Migrate your database to Apache Cassandra.
Update any dependent applications to use Apache Cassandra.

recommendations.title: Use AWS API Gateway's free tier
recommendations.description: Use AWS API Gateway's free tier instead of the paid tier.
steps: Assess the usage of your API Gateway.
Move to AWS API Gateway's free tier if usage is within the free tier limits.
